dmca.title: [EV1-C1560145E] DMCA / Breach of Copyright
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Friday, October 27, 2006 7:42 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1560145E] DMCA / Breach of Copyright Subject: [EV1-C1560145E] DMCA / Breach of Copyright ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. DMCA / Breach of Copyright Added by system at Friday, Oct 27 2006 11:23 am X-MailFrom: info@world-guides.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Oct 26 03:17:23 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:16:22 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:16:23 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from info@world-guides.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Gd0PW-0005st-Pj for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:16:22 -0500 Received: from moutng.kundenserver.de ([212.227.126.183]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from info@world-guides.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Gd0PU-000HEZ-IA for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 26 Oct 2006 03:16:21 -0500 Received: from [82.13.36.2] (helo=[192.168.0.2]) by mrelayeu.kundenserver.de (node=mrelayeu1) with ESMTP (Nemesis), id 0MKwpI-1Gd0PQ28hh-0000pm; Thu, 26 Oct 2006 10:16:17 +0200 Mime-Version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v752.2) To: abuse@theplanet.com Message-Id: <72272739-0B93-466A-AFD9-5067AA260BFF@world-guides.com> Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=Apple-Mail-1-1007260418 From: World Guides Subject: DMCA / Breach of Copyright Date: Thu, 26 Oct 2006 09:16:10 +0100 X-Mailer: Apple Mail (2.752.2) X-Provags-ID: kundenserver.de abuse@kundenserver.de login:fa083ced01784c217b428b1b3203cfeb Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 212.227.126.183 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of world-guides.com) client-ip=212.227.126.183; envelope-from=info@world-guides.com; helo=moutng.kundenserver.de; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 26 Oct 2006 08:16:22.0919 (UTC) FILETIME=[06038970:01C6F8D7] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel, Unfortunately, your client http://www.stictravel.com is once again breaching the copyright of one our sites. We have contacted them directly but have never received a response to our correspondence. Therefore, as your client is in breach of your Acceptable Use Policy, http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html, we wish to issue the following DMCA complaint: 1. MR. MARTIN TREASURE 2.The text copied is as follows: http://www.stictravel.com/packages/outbound/gaieparis.asp 3. The original text can be viewed here: http://www.paris.world-guides.com 4. Contact: Martin Treasure - director TravelSmart Ltd Tel: +44 1373 454064 Email: info@world-guides.com Address: 18 Wayside Close, Frome, Somerset, England BA11 2DL 5. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by World Guides. 6. I hereby state under penalty of perjury that this information is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the infringed materials. Many thanks for your help, please advise if you require any further information. I look forward to hearing from you shortly. MARTIN MIME element (text/html)
Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel,

Unfortunately, your client
